title: whenever camille gets into an lcs game she proves she's the epitome of balance

replies.body: she went unbanned last game then first picked and then took a massive dump on the enemy team for the majority of the game

It was less about camille herself and more about how ridiculously well her team synergized with her. 

If anything that game reminded me how much bullshit fiora is.
Thank you for this sarcasm (i hope).
LCS is nowhere near solo que.  and no Camille is not balanced for solo que
Lol?  she isn't balanced for competitive play either...
